roleset.name: (cause to) be located in
roleset.note: LOCATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'locate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'base' and 'find'. (from locate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: [The plastics plant]-1 is located *trace*-1 on an 800-acre tract in the heart of the petrochemical corridor that reaches along the U.S. Gulf Coast.
example.arg: on an 800-acre tract in the heart of the petrochemical corridor that reaches along the U.S. Gulf Coast

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mitsubishi-1 built the government's dream development, the story goes, in exchange for the official decision [*]-1 to locate Tokyo's central railway station there.

roleset.name: find
roleset.note: LOCATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'locate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'base' and 'find'. (from locate.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: passivized
example.text: The telephone number for the charity in Shelton, Conn., has been disconnected, and [the former officials]-1 couldn't be located *trace*-1.

example.name: with finder
example.text: After much searching, John finally located his teddy bear.
